06/15/2024.quote: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
06/15/2024.author: Thomas Edison

06/16/2024.quote: If I find 10,000 ways something won't work, I haven't failed. I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
06/16/2024.author: Thomas Edison

06/17/2024.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
06/17/2024.author: Thomas Edison

06/18/2024.quote: Genius is one per cent inspiration, ninety-nine per cent perspiration.
06/18/2024.author: Thomas Edison

06/19/2024.quote: Meditate … do not delay, lest you later regret it.
06/19/2024.author: The Buddha

06/20/2024.quote: A wise person should be urgently moved on occasions that make for urgency.
06/20/2024.author: The Buddha

06/21/2024.quote: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way.
06/21/2024.author: The Buddha

06/22/2024.quote: Should someone do good, let them do it again and again. They should develop this habit, for the accumulation of goodness brings joy.
06/22/2024.author: The Buddha

06/23/2024.quote: Ardently do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow, death comes.
06/23/2024.author: The Buddha

06/24/2024.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
06/24/2024.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

06/25/2024.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
06/25/2024.author: George S. Patton

06/26/2024.quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
06/26/2024.author: Babe Ruth

06/27/2024.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
06/27/2024.author: John F. Kennedy

06/28/2024.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
06/28/2024.author: Napoleon Hill

06/29/2024.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
06/29/2024.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

06/30/2024.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
06/30/2024.author: Ayn Rand

07/01/2024.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
07/01/2024.author: Sam Levenson

07/02/2024.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
07/02/2024.author: Elon Musk

07/03/2024.quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
07/03/2024.author: Ken Venturi

07/04/2024.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
07/04/2024.author: W. Clement Stone

07/05/2024.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
07/05/2024.author: Robert Schuller

07/06/2024.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
07/06/2024.author: John F. Kennedy

07/07/2024.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
07/07/2024.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

07/08/2024.quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
07/08/2024.author: Babe Ruth

07/09/2024.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
07/09/2024.author: Ayn Rand

07/10/2024.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
07/10/2024.author: William Blake

07/11/2024.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
07/11/2024.author: Kyle Chandler

07/12/2024.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
07/12/2024.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

07/14/2024.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
07/14/2024.author: Wayne Dyer

07/15/2024.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
07/15/2024.author: Napoleon Hill

07/16/2024.quote: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
07/16/2024.author: Liberace
